name: cross-process-lock
description: Cross-process file locking solution with lock-queue

scripts.travis: istanbul cover --include-all-sources ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --root ./lib --report lcovonly -- ./test/*.spec.js --timeout 50000 -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Laszlo Szikszai <sziklaszlo@gmail.com>
